game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.description: Long ago, a powerful artifact was lost deep within the ancient ruins. Your quest is to find and retrieve this artifact, for it holds the key to saving our world from impending doom.
game.reward: 500 gold coins and a legendary weapon

task.objective: Find the entrance to the ruins
task.description: The entrance to the ancient ruins is said to be hidden in the nearby forest. Search for clues and follow the path that leads you to the entrance.

task.objective: Decode the riddle of the guardians
task.description: Deep within the ruins, you will encounter guardians that protect the artifact. Solve their riddle to gain access to the next chamber.
The ancient artifact is guarded by a powerful guardian. Prepare yourself for a fierce battle and defeat the guardian to claim the artifact.
